author: James Tivendale
description:
Uhtred of Bebbanburg. Warrior. Pagan. Legend. War Lord. During his twilight years, he rests behind the castle’s mighty walls with his partner, Benedetta, his warrior companions (including the formidable Irish swordsman Finan), and his subjects. The restful and uneventful air surrounding Bebbanburg is pierced by two foreboding omens: a dragon flying south and a star […]

title: REVIEW: War Lord by Bernard Cornwell
